data.title: Tea time
data.text: Wonderful evening at the Stillwater. Beautiful setting, wonderful atmosphere. Lady Tonia is a great hostess. Highly recommend the Stillwater for a relaxing time and lovely tea.

data.title: Best afternoon tea ever!
data.text:
Not only is this mansion fascinating you will experience afternoon tea that truly a delight!
This is not like the hotel's or tea rooms .  
I have been to many afternoon tea from London,to Canada ,to the beautiful USA
This is s must .  I recommend bucket list for those of you who enjoy a good afternoon tea.  
Stillwater mansion Idaho falls far from being just a typical place to go for tea. 
Try it you will have no regrets.

data.title: Perfect in Every Way
data.text: An amazing Teahouse with everything you could ask for!! Traditional Afternoon Tea (tea, danties, light sandwiches, scones and cream) with history. Even if you aren't a fan of tea the atmosphere and food alone are worth it. Reservations are needed as they set up tables specifically for their guests.
